divs: Sighting DetailsLast night around 10:20pm we saw another UFO this is my third sighting,possible 4th I was coming down maytide St stop at the red light at 51 and there it was a triangle shape UFO with 4 white lights with one in the center, it was definitely one object, I tryed to follow it and we notice within like 3 seconds it went from 4 lights we could see to just one white light and then it disappeared!!!
trends: There have been 122 other sightings in Pittsburgh
There was one other sighting in Pittsburgh on or around March 16th 2012
